metadata.title: MY KILOMETRE Womens Cycling Bike Bib Shorts Women Bicycle Riding Pants Padded Cycle Bib Shorts
features: ➊ 【Ultra-High Gauge Compression Fabric】：Highly compressive main body fabric, exceptional muscle support, matte finish.(SIZE M :8.66 " inseam, SIZE XL :9.05" inseam)

➋【Bib Freedom】: Easy system for women to use the bathroom without removing jersey, helmet or glasses. (Veil mesh front panel adds almost no weight, yet stabilizes bib straps for the best possible support.)
➌【Easily Accessible Reflective Pockets】: Storage pockets on each side of the legs for easy access while on the bike. Hemming reflective logos for added visibility.

➍【MK WOMEN'S CYCLE 2.0 MULTI DENSITY CHAMOIS】While the top surface is characterized by being totally flush, providing close and continuous skin contact. The "pelvic tract" area was tested and engineered to support the rotation of the pelvic bone on the saddle while pedaling. The ultra-high density insert makes this product ideal for 6-plushour rides
➎【Mesh Bib Straps & Leg Gripper】Mesh bibs aid with air flow and ventilation to prevent over-heating and maintain dryness and comfort whilst riding. Non-slip silicone leg grippers.
description: The Women's Training Bib Shorts feature a host of MK's fabric technologies and have an ergonomic fit that sits perfectly when in a riding position.You'll find side panels use a polyamide fabric, with a controlled elasticity, to give compressive muscle support and total freedom of movement.To the upper body, the bibs are high stretch and again tailored to fit perfectly when in a riding position, so much so you'll barely notice them there when riding. The 50mm Leg Stability System at the leg ends features a deep elastic leg band with silicon woven in the structure that keeps the legs in place and distributes pressure on the leg firmly and evenly, without any fear of bulging.

title: MY KILOMETRE Womens Cycling Bike Bib Shorts
